App Status

Includes Serial

The best-selling digital multimedia suite, the world has added a new Platinum version.
In addition, Nero Multimedia Suite 10 Platinum HD also includes all the tools Multimedia Suite 10:

Complement playback of Blu-ray
Watch movies on Blu-ray image quality and incredible sound.

* Play CD audio discs and movies on DVD and Blu-ray
* Exceptional playback quality universal player

Move it snap
Download multimedia content between mobile devices.

* Make photos, music and videos and transfer between mobile devices (iPod Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â®, iPhone Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â®, ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ Android phones, etc.).
* Easily transfer files to MP3, FLAC, HE-AAC, AVC (H.264), MPEG-2, MPEG-4. Wma and many other formats of video and audio files to the desired devices, computer equipment, mobile phone, digital camera, etc..

Nero Creative CollectionPack 1
Give the crowning touch to your videos with creative effects.

* Nero Picture-in-Picture EffectPack 1 - set of 50 professionally designed picture in picture, plus 30 background images of high quality.
* Nero Transition EffectPack 1 - set of 50 professional transition effects.
* Nero themepack Movie 3 & 4 - set of 25 movie themes, such as Seasonal, Romantic, Kids, Home cinema and sports, plus 25 additional menu templates.

DiscCopy Gadget * Nero does not run on 64-bit operating systems
